title: Pink Floyd - Welcome To The Machine (Person Of Interest)
author: Serkan Vatan
comment: I don't care what anyone says, this is the greatest moment in television history.
who thinks this song is perfectly chosen for this season finally

This scene got me, I cried. and the portrayal of both The Machine and Samaritan could not have been more perfect. Samaritan being black text on a white background (darkness within the light) and The Machine being white text on a black background (light within the darkness) and as the text from the machine not being pure white but degraded to almost fading to the black symbolizing its imminent death. They could not have done this scene any better than this.
"Baba özür dilerim seni başarısızlığa uğrattım ve  "Teşekkür ederim beni yarattığın için" dediği anlarda utanmasam ağlayacaktım tekrar tekrar izliyorum sahneyi
Makine her ne kadar acı çekmeyeceğim desede nasıl bir duygusallık kattı bu sahne öyle.  Aklıma harold'un gençlik yılları geldi.
